returns._0: ipRoyaltyVaultBeacon The ip royalty vault beacon address

setIpRoyaltyVaultBeacon(address).details: Set the ip royalty vault beaconEnforced to be only callable by the protocol admin in governance

params.beacon: The ip royalty vault beacon address

setSnapshotInterval(uint256).details: Set the snapshot intervalEnforced to be only callable by the protocol admin in governance

params.timestampInterval: The minimum timestamp interval between snapshots

returns._0: snapshotInterval The minimum time interval between snapshots

upgradeVaults(address).details: Upgrades the ip royalty vault beaconEnforced to be only callable by the upgrader admin

params.newVault: The new ip royalty vault beacon address

ipRoyaltyVaultBeacon().notice: Returns the ip royalty vault beacon
